flavorText: When the alarm crystals flash, Drannith's finest answer the call.

foreignData.flavorText: Wenn die Alarmkristalle aufleuchten, machen sich die besten Krieger von Drannith auf den Weg.
foreignData.name: Ruft die Kupferjacken
foreignData.text:
Streben — Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Wirken für jedes Ziel außer dem ersten {1}{W} mehr.
Bestimme eine beliebige Anzahl an Gegnern deiner Wahl. Erzeuge X 1/1 weiße Mensch-Soldat-Kreaturenspielsteine, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Kreaturen ist, die jene Gegner kontrollieren.

foreignData.flavorText: Cuando destellan los cristales de alarma, los mejores de Drannith acuden a la llamada.
foreignData.name: Llamar a las Capas de Cobre
foreignData.text:
Esfuerzo — Te cuesta {1}{W} más lanzar este hechizo por cada objetivo después del primero.
Elige cualquier cantidad de oponentes objetivo. Crea X fichas de criatura Soldado Humano blancas 1/1, donde X es la cantidad de criaturas que esos oponentes controlan.

foreignData.flavorText: Quand les cristaux d'alerte s'illuminent, c'est l'élite de Drannith qui répond à l'appel.
foreignData.name: Appelez les Capes de cuivre !
foreignData.text:
Obstination — Ce sort coûte {1}{W} de plus à lancer pour chaque cible après la première.
Choisissez n'importe quel nombre d'adversaires ciblés. Créez X jetons de créature 1/1 blanche Humain et Soldat, X étant le nombre de créatures que ces adversaires contrôlent.

foreignData.flavorText: Quando i cristalli d'allarme si illuminano, i migliori soldati di Drannith rispondono alla chiamata.
foreignData.name: Convocare le Giubbe Ramate
foreignData.text:
Sforzo — Questa magia costa {1}{W} in più per essere lanciata per ogni bersaglio oltre il primo.
Scegli un qualsiasi numero di avversari bersaglio. Crea X pedine creatura Soldato Umano 1/1 bianche, dove X è il numero di creature controllate da quegli avversari.

foreignData.flavorText: 警報水晶が光るとき、ドラニスの警官たちがそれに応える。
foreignData.name: 銅纏いの呼集
foreignData.text:
奮励 ― この呪文を唱えるためのコストは、２つ目以降の対象１つにつき{1}{W}多くなる。
望む数の対戦相手を対象とする。白の１/１の人間・兵士・クリーチャー・トークンＸ体を生成する。Ｘはそれらの対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャーの総数に等しい。

foreignData.flavorText: Quando os cristais se acendem em alarme, os melhores de Drannith atendem ao chamado.
foreignData.name: Convocar os Gibões de Cobre
foreignData.text:
Esforço — Esta mágica custa {1}{W} a mais para ser conjurada para cada alvo além do primeiro.
Escolha qualquer número de oponentes alvo. Crie X fichas de criatura Humano Soldado branca 1/1, sendo X o número de criaturas que aqueles oponentes controlam.

foreignData.flavorText: Когда вспыхивают кристаллы, предупреждающие об опасности, отборные воины Драннита спешат на зов.
foreignData.name: Созыв Медных Кителей
foreignData.text:
Стремление — За каждую цель после первой разыгрывание этого заклинания стоит на {1}{W} больше.
Выберите любое количество целевых оппонентов. Создайте X фишек существа 1/1 белый Человек Солдат, где X — количество существ под контролем тех оппонентов.

foreignData.flavorText: 一旦预警水晶闪烁亮光，便有卓尼斯最精锐部队回应。
foreignData.name: 召集紫铜军
foreignData.text:
积力～此咒语在第一个目标之外每有一个目标，便增加{1}{W}来施放。
选择任意数量的目标对手。派出X个1/1白色人类／士兵衍生生物，X为由这些对手操控的生物数量。

foreignData.flavorText: 一旦預警水晶閃爍亮光，便有卓尼斯最精銳部隊回應。
foreignData.name: 召集紫銅軍
foreignData.text:
積力～此咒語在第一個目標之外每有一個目標，便增加{1}{W}來施放。
選擇任意數量的目標對手。派出X個1/1白色人類／士兵衍生生物，X為由這些對手操控的生物數量。

name: Call the Coppercoats
originalText:
Strive — This spell costs {1}{W} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Choose any number of target opponents. Create X 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens, where X is the number of creatures those opponents control.

rulings.text: Any target opponents that are no longer legal targets by the time Call the Coppercoats resolves won't have their creatures counted when determining how many tokens you create.

You choose how many targets each spell with a strive ability has and what those targets are as you cast it. It's legal to cast such a spell with no targets, although this is rarely a good idea. You can't choose the same target more than once for a single strive spell.
The mana value of a strive spell doesn't change no matter how many targets it has.

If this spell is copied and the effect that copies the spell allows a player to choose new targets for the copy, the number of targets can't be changed. The player may change any number of the targets, including all of them or none of them. If, for one of the targets, the player can't choose a new legal target, then it remains unchanged (even if the current target is illegal).
If a spell or ability allows you to cast a strive spell without paying its mana cost, you must pay the additional cost for any targets beyond the first.

text:
Strive — This spell costs {1}{W} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Choose any number of target opponents. Create X 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens, where X is the number of creatures those opponents control.
